awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.

fullplot: A young man ushers an older woman into a dark exploration of her past - back to the time when, as a young girl, she met a stranger who affected her life forever.
plot: A young man ushers an older woman into a dark exploration of her past - back to the time when, as a young girl, she met a stranger who affected her life forever.
title: Capturing Mary
